name: Lc points
tagline: A Windows Universal application, to calculate Irish Leaving Cert/CAO points
body:
### Welcome to LC Points.
LC Points - Is a Windows Universal application that calculates Irish Leaving Certificate points, based on subject/grade cobinations entered. LC Points 
also offers options to share your result on Facebook.



![](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BzlcEkJ1DNI1bVpRXzlsT0k4N2s/view?usp=sharing)


### Authors and Contributors
(@BrianJVarley) 

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with LC Points? Check out the documentation at https://github.com/BrianJVarley/LC_Points
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
